video_prompt: Subtle head tilt, eyes slowly blink, hair sways gently. Light flickers subtly in the background, creating dynamic shadows. Minor glitched artifacts shift and resolve. Slight depth of field focus rack from foreground to background.
image_prompt:
A vertically oriented, full-body portrait of a young woman with short, wavy, silver-white hair and intense, slightly shadowed eyes. She sports a white-cropped tank top, revealing a lean midriff with a tattoo on her right hip and left arm. Her attire includes a black leather mini-skirt with a buckle, black choker with a hanging cross, and multiple black bracelets/wristbands. Her legs are adorned with strappy accessories holding knives and she wears dark boots with visible red soles.

The figure is centrally placed, framed by an abstract, glitched background featuring swirling black and dark gray liquid-like forms against a darker background, with prominent, thick, wavy red lines. The background also has hints of blue and white. The overall style is cyberpunk/futuristic, with heavy "glitch" effects throughout the image, characterized by horizontal bands of discolored pixels (red, green, blue, yellow, white, black), color shifts, and pixelation, especially at the top and bottom.

The lighting creates a dramatic atmosphere, highlighting the figure against the abstract patterns. The predominant colors are black, white, red, and various glitch-induced RGB colors. The mood is dark, mysterious, and edgy. Text elements include "AI 生成" in the top left and "c29" in the bottom right, both affected by the glitch aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: Head slowly tilts, eyes gently blink, hair sways. Flickering light casts dynamic background shadows. Minor glitching artifacts shift and resolve. Depth of field racks smoothly from front to back.
creative_video_prompt_1: **Sudden head snap, eyes bulge wide, hair erupts outward. Explosions ripple through the background, casting jagged, strobing shadows. Glitches tear through the frame, warp and distort reality. Extreme depth of field shifts, abruptly snapping focus, magnifying chaos.**
creative_video_prompt_2: Gravity shatters, sending debris upward. Hair transforms into flowing digital streams, while eyes ripple like liquid. The background melts into a vortex of impossible colors, objects morphing into abstract geometries. Time loops backward, then spirals into fractured dimensions, as glitched artifacts spontaneously combust. Depth of field dissolves, reforming into an ever-shifting, kaleidoscopic tunnel.
creative_video_prompt_3: A sharp zoom-in to her piercing gaze. Subtle head tilt as her eyes slowly blink, revealing a flicker of red. Hair sways gently, catching dynamic shadows from the background's light flicker. A fast tilt-up from her boots, revealing glitched artifacts that ripple and resolve, hinting at a corrupted reality. The camera then performs a slow 360-degree orbit around her, ending in an extreme close-up on her face.
